---
title: Playing with bootstrap progress bars.
---

## Pure HTML

```{=html}
<style>
.progress {
  height: 32px !important;
}

.progress-bar {
  color: var(--bs-black);
  font-size: large !important;
}
</style>

<table>
  <tr>
    <td>
      Python
    </td>
    <td>
      <div
        class="progress"
        aria-valuenow="7"
        aria-valuemin="0"
        aria-valuemax="7"
        role="progressbar"
      >
        <div
          class="progress-bar bg-warning progress-bar-animated progress-bar-striped"
          style="width: 100%;"
        >
          7 Years
        </div>
      </div>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      JavaScript
    </td>
    <td>
      <div
        class="progress"
        aria-valuenow="7"
        aria-valuemin="0"
        aria-valuemax="4"
        role="progressbar"
        style="height: 16px;"
      >
        <div
          class="progress-bar bg-success progress-bar-animated progress-bar-striped"
          style="width: 70%;"
        >
          4 Years
        </div>
      </div>
    </td>
  </tr>
</table>
```
